remarks: The Möbius function is a multiplicative function.  This is one of the primary interests of the Möbius function as an arithmetic function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)
statement: mumul $p |- ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN /\ ( A gcd B ) = 1 ) -> ( mmu ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( mmu ` A ) x. ( mmu ` B ) ) ) $.
